message: Salt too much! The egg overpowers the eggplant.
Cooking time too short, the eggplant is still raw.
Overcooked! Crispy edges, but the inside is mushy.
A very slippery dish you have here. Maybe lessen the oil next time?
I might feel sick with all the oil.
Why is this dish swimming in oil?
I wish everyone has money to use so much oil as you have.
Salt level is perfect! The egg and eggplant are in harmony.
Cooking time nailed! The eggplant is soft and flavorful.
Beautiful cook! Golden outside, tender inside.
All ingredients cooked correctly; next round, master the sequence to wow everyone!
Your Tortang Talong could star on a breakfast table. Steps were playful, but the result shines.
The egg coating is golden perfection! A tiny step misstep, but the flavor is full marks.
